name: Get Hit Only Once
description:
2D platformer in which you have to fight danmaku users with your bare hands, but all is good as you only have to touch them once.

No sound and rather short as I decided to join while the jam was already running. I do not know wether the last boss can be defeated without getting hit, however you can get there without getting hit.

Credits:

Character sprites: 「FocasLens」(http://www.fo-lens.net/, https://twitter.com/gn_gekidan), 幻想人形劇団

Danmaku sprites: 東方甘無月 -Trick and treat night-

Tileset: Caves of Gallet by Adam Saltsman (https://adamatomic.itch.io/)

And obviously the original character design is by ZUN.
